subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|縣|心|t2=heart|ls=psc|c1=p|c2=s}} – to be concerned (in one’s heart).

subSections.text:
{{zh-forms|s=悬}}

|m=xuán

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}} # to [[hang]]; to [[suspend]]; to [[hoist]] # to be [[hung]] # to [[announce]] # to [[feel]] [[anxious]] # to [[imagine]] # to [[raise]] # [[unsettled]]; [[unresolved]] # {{lb|zh|colloquial}} [[dangerous]] #* {{zh-x|甲：「考試 考 得{de} 怎麼樣 呢？」
乙：「懸。」|A: How did you do on your test?
B: '''Dangerous'''. ''(meaning: I might have failed but I might have passed.)''}} # [[far]] [[apart]] # {{surname|lang=zh}}
